com.b2international.snowowl.core.exceptions

Interface ApiError


  • public interface ApiError
    Represents a common error object create because of a failed API call, and can be derived mostly from ApiException subclasses.
    Since:
    4.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ApiError.Builder
      Builds ApiError representations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getAdditionalInfo()
      Additional information about the error.
      Integer getCode()
      Custom application specific error code associated with the error.
      String getDeveloperMessage()
      Returns a developer-friendly (more verbose than the getMessage()) error message.
      String getMessage()
      Returns a user-friendly error message, which can be directly used in User interfaces to show the error to the end-user.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        String getMessage()
        Returns a user-friendly error message, which can be directly used in User interfaces to show the error to the end-user. It should never contain any kind of technical information, that should go to the getDeveloperMessage().
        Returns:

      • getDeveloperMessage

        String getDeveloperMessage()
        Returns a developer-friendly (more verbose than the getMessage()) error message. It can be used to investigate problems and the cause of them. Usually can contain technical information, parameter values, etc.
        Returns:

      • getCode

        Integer getCode()
        Custom application specific error code associated with the error.
        Returns:

      • getAdditionalInfo

        Map<String,Object> getAdditionalInfo()
        Additional information about the error.
        Returns:
